title: HMRC UK Trade in Goods Statistics by Business Characteristics 2015
description: Spreadsheets seem to be same data, presented differently (with "IDBR OTS Country data (expert users)" being a subset.). Contains estimates of Trade in Goods data matched with registered Businesses from the Inter-Departmental Business Register (IDBR) for Exporters and Importers for 2015
datasetNotes: Data can be found by clicking on the Excel table links titled "IDBR OTS tables 2015" and "IDBR OTS Country data (expert users) 2015" under the table headed "Reports" and produced November 2016. Spreadsheets seem to be same data, presented differently with "IDBR OTS Country data (expert users)" being a subset.
sizingNotes: Non-simple file structure but with multiple table within tabs, multiple dimensions, subdimensions and footnotes.
notes: Supporting information is available in the PDF on the lading page
